We do take walk-ins from Monday - Thursday 9:00 AM- 12:30 PM", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/eastern-pennsylvania/west-philadelphia/alleviate-hunger/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5501 Market Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19139", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9610016, "longitude": -75.2312927}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 474-1010", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will reschedule in case of holiday closures"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Distributes food after church services.
